title: New method makes vaccines stable at tropical temperatures
description: New method makes vaccines stable at tropical temperatures 18 February 2010 A simple and cheap way of making vaccines stable - even at tropical temperatures - has been demonstrated by scientists at | New method makes vaccines stable at tropical temperatures 18 February 2010 A simple and cheap way of making vaccines stable - even at tropical temperatures - has been demonstrated by scientists at
